text.section:
Except as permitted by § 12-405(a) of this subtitle, any commission, finder's fee, or point shall be paid by the lender, and may be paid only to:
A licensed real estate broker;
A lawyer licensed to practice law in the State; or
A licensee.
An agreement to pay a commission, finder's fee, or point may not be enforced unless it is in writing and signed by the lender.
